text: Refreshing drinks made from natural fruits, flowers, or seeds mixed with water and sugar. Perfect for cooling off while enjoying the local streets and markets.
A rich and flavorful sauce made from dried chilies, spices, and chocolate, typically served over chicken or pork. Mole rojo is a staple of Guerrero cuisine.
Sweet and savory tamales made with a mix of dried fruits, nuts, and meat, wrapped in banana leaves. Traditionally served during celebrations and special occasions.
